chemistry.exception

Class ChemException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • chemistry.exception.ChemException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChemException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception dealing with Commons chemistry.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ChemException E_CONFIG_BASE_NOT_FOUND
      Thrown if an electron configuration has no base.
      static ChemException E_CONFIG_BASE_OUT_BOUNDS
      Thrown if a term of an electron configuration is impossible.
      static ChemException EQ_NOT_COMPLETE
      Thrown if the chemical equation is incomplete.
      static ChemException MOLECULE_ELEM_AND_FREQ_NO_MATCH
      Thrown if the number of elements and number of frequencies are not equal.

      Create a new chemistry exception.
